member.name: T:Neo4j.Driver.Extensions.AsyncSessionExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods for the

member.name: M:Neo4j.Driver.Extensions.AsyncSessionExtensions.RunReadTransactionForObjects``1(Neo4j.Driver.IAsyncSession,System.String,System.Object,System.String)
member.summary: Executes a transaction returning the specified.
member.remarks: This should be used with queries returning values, for example: MATCH (n) RETURN n
member.typeparam: The type to attempt to cast to. This should be a class.
member.param: The to run the transaction on.
The query to execute.
The parameters to the query.
The identifier to cast into . e.g. if the query is MATCH (n) RETURN n the identifier is n.

member.name: M:Neo4j.Driver.Extensions.AsyncSessionExtensions.RunReadTransaction``1(Neo4j.Driver.IAsyncSession,System.String,System.Object,System.String)
member.summary: Executes a transaction returning the specified.
member.remarks: This should be used with queries not returning values, for example: MATCH (n) RETURN n.title AS title
member.typeparam: The type to attempt to cast to. This should be a class.
member.param: The to run the transaction on.
The query to execute.
The parameters to the query.
The identifier to cast into . e.g. if the query is MATCH (n) RETURN n.title AS title the identifier is title.
